key_risks: Service reliability concerns due to major outage in June 2021
Customer concentration risk with 92% of revenue from enterprise clients
Intense competition from established players like Akamai and Cloudflare
Regulatory and compliance challenges, including GDPR and data privacy laws
controversies: June 2021 outage affecting high-profile clients and damaging reputation
Leadership changes with departure of former CEO Joshua Bixby
governance_issues: Leadership changes introducing uncertainty during a critical period
